title: Supremum and infimum on the extended reals

blocks.name: xrsupexmnf
blocks.content: Adding minus infinity to a set does not affect the existence of its supremum. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrsupexmnf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))))))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))))))), diffss(s1, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  reximia(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))))), wa(wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))))))
  anim12d1(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))), wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))
  ralimdv2(s1, c0, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cun(c0, csn(cmnf))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s1), cun(c0, csn(cmnf))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))), wo(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), csn(cmnf))))
  elun(cv(s1), c0, csn(cmnf))
  jaod(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), csn(cmnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), csn(cmnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))))
  syl5bi(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(s1), csn(cmnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s1), cmnf))
  velsn(s1, cmnf)
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wceq(cv(s1), cmnf), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cmnf)))
  nltmnf(cv(s0))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s1), cmnf), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cmnf))
  breq2(cv(s1), cmnf, cv(s0), clt)
  ralimi(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))))
  imim2i(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))
  reximi2(s2, c0, cun(c0, csn(cmnf)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))
  anim1i(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cun(c0, csn(cmnf))))
  elun1(cv(s2), c0, csn(cmnf))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cxr)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: xrinfmexpnf
blocks.content: Adding plus infinity to a set does not affect the existence of its infimum. (Contributed by NM, 19-Jan-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrinfmexpnf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)))))))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)))))))), diffss(s1, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  reximia(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)))))), wa(wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)))))))
  anim12d1(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))), wral(s1, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))
  ralimdv2(s1, c0, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cun(c0, csn(cpnf))), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s1), cun(c0, csn(cpnf))), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wo(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), csn(cpnf))))
  elun(cv(s1), c0, csn(cpnf))
  jaod(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), csn(cpnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), csn(cpnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))))
  syl5bi(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(s1), csn(cpnf)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s1), cpnf))
  velsn(s1, cpnf)
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wceq(cv(s1), cpnf), wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cpnf, clt, cv(s0))))
  pnfnlt(cv(s0))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s1), cpnf), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cpnf, clt, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(s1), cpnf, clt, cv(s0))
  ralimi(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)))))
  imim2i(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))), wrex(s2, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))
  reximi2(s2, c0, cun(c0, csn(cpnf)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)))
  anim1i(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cun(c0, csn(cpnf))))
  elun1(cv(s2), c0, csn(cpnf))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cxr)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: xrsupsslem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ xrsupss . (Contributed by NM, 25-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrsupsslem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cxr), wo(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cpnf, c0))), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  jaodan(wss(c0, cxr), wss(c0, cr), wcel(cpnf, c0), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))))
  adantl(wss(c0, cxr), wss(c0, cr), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))))
  pm2.61ne(c0, emptycls, wss(c0, cr), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, emptycls, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, emptycls, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))))
  rexbidv(s0, cxr, wceq(c0, emptycls), wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))))), wa(wral(s1, emptycls, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, emptycls, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(c0, emptycls), wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))), wral(s1, emptycls, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, emptycls, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))
  raleq(s1, c0, emptycls, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))
  ralbidv(s1, cxr, wceq(c0, emptycls), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, emptycls, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(c0, emptycls), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))), wrex(s2, emptycls, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))
  rexeq(s2, c0, emptycls, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))
  pm2.61dan(wa(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, cxr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))

  syl5bi((c0 ⊆ ℝ* ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ* ∧ sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <)), hs0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), ¬ sup(c1, ℝ*, <)[<]hs0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∨ hs0 ∈ c1))
  elun(hs0, c0, c1)
  jaod((c0 ⊆ ℝ* ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ* ∧ sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <)), hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ sup(c1, ℝ*, <)[<]hs0)
  mpdd((c0 ⊆ ℝ* ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ* ∧ sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <)), hs0 ∈ c0, ¬ sup(c1, ℝ*, <)[<]hs0, ¬ sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[<]hs0)

  com34(c0 ⊆ ℝ*, c1 ⊆ ℝ*, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <), hs0 ∈ c0, (¬ sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[<]hs0 → ¬ sup(c1, ℝ*, <)[<]hs0))
  exp41(c0 ⊆ ℝ*, c1 ⊆ ℝ*, hs0 ∈ c0, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <), (¬ sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[<]hs0 → ¬ sup(c1, ℝ*, <)[<]hs0))

blocks.name: supxrunb2
blocks.content: The supremum of an unbounded-above set of extended reals is plus infinity. (Contributed by NM, 19-Jan-2006.)

  leidd(csup(c0, cr, clt), w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))

  suprleub(s0, s1, hs0, c0, csup(c0, cr, clt))
  syl2anc(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))), wb(wbr(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cle, csup(c0, cr, clt)), wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, csup(c0, cr, clt)))), wss(c0, cxr), wcel(csup(c0, cr, clt), cxr))
  syl6ss(c0, cxr, cr, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))
  simp1(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  ressxr()
  rexrd(csup(c0, cr, clt), w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))

thm supxrbnd(class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wbr(csup(c0, cxr, clt), clt, cpnf)), wcel(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cr))

  syl(wss(c0, cxr), wi(wbr(csup(c0, cxr, clt), clt, cpnf), wne(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf)), wcel(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cxr))

  bitr3d(wss(c0, cxr), wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf), wral(hs1, cr, wn(wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1))))), wral(hs1, cr, wrex(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0)))))

  syl6bb(wa(wss(c0, cxr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wrex(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0))), wn(wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs0, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))))
  rexbidva(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c0, cxr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wss(c0, cxr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wb(wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs1), cxr))

thm supxrbnd(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[<]+∞)→ sup(c0, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ)
} = {
  syld3an3(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ≠ ∅, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[<]+∞, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]hs1)))
  3adant2(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ≠ ∅, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[<]+∞, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]hs1)))
  sylan(c0 ⊆ ℝ, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[<]+∞, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]hs1)), c0 ⊆ ℝ*)
  mpan2(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ⊆ ℝ*, ℝ ⊆ ℝ*)
  ressxr()
  sstr(c0, cr, cxr)
  imp(c0 ⊆ ℝ*, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[<]+∞, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]hs1)))
  sylibrd(c0 ⊆ ℝ*, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[<]+∞, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]hs1)), sup(c0, ℝ*, <)≠ +∞)
  syl(c0 ⊆ ℝ*, (sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[<]+∞ → sup(c0, ℝ*, <)≠ +∞), sup(c0, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*)
  supxrcl(c0)
  ex(sup(c0, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[<]+∞, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)≠ +∞)
  necomd(sup(c0, ℝ*, <), cpnf, (sup(c0, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ* ∧ sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[<]+∞))
  mp3an2(sup(c0, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[<]+∞, +∞ ≠ sup(c0, ℝ*, <), +∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  pnfxr()
  xrltne(sup(c0, ℝ*, <), cpnf)
  necon2abid(sup(c0, ℝ*, <), cpnf, c0 ⊆ ℝ*, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]hs1)))
  syl6bb(c0 ⊆ ℝ*, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)= +∞, ¬ ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]hs1)), ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ¬ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]hs1)))
  bitr3d(c0 ⊆ ℝ*, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)= +∞, ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ¬ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]hs1)), ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, hs1[<]hs0)))
  supxrunb2(hs1, hs0, c0)
  ralbidva(hs1, cr, c0 ⊆ ℝ*, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, hs1[<]hs0), ¬ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]hs1))
  syl6bb((c0 ⊆ ℝ* ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, hs1[<]hs0), ¬ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]hs1), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[≤]hs1))
  rexbidva(hs0, c0, (c0 ⊆ ℝ* ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), hs1[<]hs0, ¬ hs0[≤]hs1)
  syl2anc(((c0 ⊆ ℝ* ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs1[<]hs0 ↔ ¬ hs0[≤]hs1), hs0 ∈ ℝ*, hs1 ∈ ℝ*)
  adantlr(c0 ⊆ ℝ*, hs1 ∈ ℝ, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ ℝ*)
  ssel2(c0, cxr, hs0)
  ad2antlr(c0 ⊆ ℝ*, hs1 ∈ ℝ, hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ ℝ*)
  rexr(hs1)
  con2bid((hs0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ*), hs1[<]hs0, hs0[≤]hs1)
  xrlenlt(hs0, hs1)
  rexnal(hs0, c0, hs0[≤]hs1)
  ralnex(hs1, cr, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]hs1))
  eqeltrd(sup(c0, ℝ*, <), cr, sup(c0, ℝ, <), (c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]hs1))))
  supxrre(hs1, hs0, c0)
  suprcl(hs1, hs0, c0)

  diff.hs1.w(c0 ⊆ ℝ*)

  con3d(wa(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cr), wbr(csup(c0, cxr, clt), clt, cpnf))
  3expia(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wbr(csup(c0, cxr, clt), clt, cpnf), wcel(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cr))
  supxrbnd(c0)
  syl(wa(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls)), wb(wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf), wn(wbr(csup(c0, cxr, clt), clt, cpnf))), wcel(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cxr))
  adantr(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cxr))
  syl(wss(c0, cr), wcel(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cxr), wss(c0, cxr))
  mpan2(wss(c0, cr), wss(c0, cxr), wss(cr, cxr))

blocks.name: supxrre1

blocks.name: supxrss
blocks.content: Smaller sets of extended reals have smaller suprema. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm supxrss(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr)), wbr(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cle, csup(c1, cxr, clt)))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr)), wbr(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cle, csup(c1, cxr, clt)), wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, csup(c1, cxr, clt))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, csup(c1, cxr, clt)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, csup(c1, cxr, clt)), wss(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  simplr(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c0, c1, wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr)))
  simpl(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr))
  supxrub(c1, cv(hs0))
  syl2anc(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr)), wb(wbr(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cle, csup(c1, cxr, clt)), wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, csup(c1, cxr, clt)))), wss(c0, cxr), wcel(csup(c1, cxr, clt), cxr))
  sstr(c0, c1, cxr)
  adantl(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr), wcel(csup(c1, cxr, clt), cxr))
  supxrcl(c1)
  supxrleub(hs0, c0, csup(c1, cxr, clt))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csup(c1, cxr, clt))
}

thm supxrss(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ*)→ sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <))
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ*), sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ*), hs0[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <))
  syl2anc(((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ*)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <), c1 ⊆ ℝ*, hs0 ∈ c1)
  simplr(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ ℝ*, hs0 ∈ c0)
  sselda(hs0, c0, c1, (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ*))
  simpl(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ ℝ*)
  supxrub(c1, hs0)
  syl2anc((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ*), (sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <)↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <))), c0 ⊆ ℝ*, sup(c1, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*)
  sstr(c0, c1, cxr)
  adantl(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ ℝ*, sup(c1, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*)
  supxrcl(c1)
  supxrleub(hs0, c0, sup(c1, ℝ*, <))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ*))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(sup(c1, ℝ*, <))
}

  id(wss(c0, cxr))
  ralnex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))
  syl2anr(wss(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wb(wbr(c1, cle, cinf(c0, cxr, clt)), wn(wbr(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), clt, c1))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cxr))
  id(wcel(c1, cxr))

  syl6bbr((c0 ⊆ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*), ¬ inf(c0, ℝ*, <)[<]c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ s0[<]c1), ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s0[<]c1))

  id(c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  infxrcl(c0)
  xrlenlt(c1, inf(c0, ℝ*, <))
  ralbidva(s0, c0, (c0 ⊆ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*), c1[≤]s0, ¬ s0[<]c1)
  xrlenltd(c1, s0, ((c0 ⊆ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*)∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  simplr(c0 ⊆ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ*, s0 ∈ c0)

  diff.cxr.s(s0)

blocks.name: infxrmnf
blocks.content: The infinimum of a set of extended reals containing minus infinity is minus infinity. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 28-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: xrinf0
blocks.content: The infimum of the empty set under the extended reals is positive infinity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2015.) (Revised by AV, 5-Sep-2020.)

thm xrinf0() {
  |- wceq(cinf(emptycls, cxr, clt), cpnf)
} = {
  mptru(wceq(cinf(emptycls, cxr, clt), cpnf))

  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cpnf)))
  pm2.21i(wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cpnf)))
  noel(cv(hs0))
  adantl(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cpnf, clt, cv(hs0))), wrex(hs1, emptycls, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0))))
  imp(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cpnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, emptycls, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0))))
  pm2.21d(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cpnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, emptycls, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0))))
  pnfnlt(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs0.c(cpnf)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(cxr)
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(cpnf)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
}

blocks.name: infxrss
blocks.content: Larger sets of extended reals have smaller infima. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.) (Revised by AV, 13-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm infxrss(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr)), wbr(cinf(c1, cxr, clt), cle, cinf(c0, cxr, clt)))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr)), wbr(cinf(c1, cxr, clt), cle, cinf(c0, cxr, clt)), wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cinf(c1, cxr, clt), cle, cv(hs0))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr)), wbr(cinf(c1, cxr, clt), cle, cv(hs0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cinf(c1, cxr, clt), cle, cv(hs0)), wss(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  simplr(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c0, c1, wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr)))
  simpl(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr))
  infxrlb(c1, cv(hs0))
  syl2anc(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr)), wb(wbr(cinf(c1, cxr, clt), cle, cinf(c0, cxr, clt)), wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cinf(c1, cxr, clt), cle, cv(hs0)))), wss(c0, cxr), wcel(cinf(c1, cxr, clt), cxr))
  sstr(c0, c1, cxr)
  adantl(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr), wcel(cinf(c1, cxr, clt), cxr))
  infxrcl(c1)
  infxrgelb(hs0, c0, cinf(c1, cxr, clt))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cxr)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cinf(c1, cxr, clt))
}

thm infxrss(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ*)→ inf(c1, ℝ*, <)[≤]inf(c0, ℝ*, <))
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ*), inf(c1, ℝ*, <)[≤]inf(c0, ℝ*, <), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, inf(c1, ℝ*, <)[≤]hs0))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ*), inf(c1, ℝ*, <)[≤]hs0)
  syl2anc(((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ*)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), inf(c1, ℝ*, <)[≤]hs0, c1 ⊆ ℝ*, hs0 ∈ c1)
  simplr(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ ℝ*, hs0 ∈ c0)
  sselda(hs0, c0, c1, (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ*))
  simpl(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ ℝ*)
  infxrlb(c1, hs0)
  syl2anc((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ*), (inf(c1, ℝ*, <)[≤]inf(c0, ℝ*, <)↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, inf(c1, ℝ*, <)[≤]hs0)), c0 ⊆ ℝ*, inf(c1, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*)
  sstr(c0, c1, cxr)
  adantl(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ ℝ*, inf(c1, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*)
  infxrcl(c1)
  infxrgelb(hs0, c0, inf(c1, ℝ*, <))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ*))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(inf(c1, ℝ*, <))
}

blocks.content: For all real numbers there is a smaller real number. (Contributed by AV, 5-Sep-2020.)

thm reltre(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wral(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  rgen(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))
  rspcedvd(s1, cr, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(s0)))
  peano2rem(cv(s0))
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), wb(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(s0))))
  breq1(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(s0))
  ltm1(cv(s0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(s0))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm reltxrnmnf(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wral(s0, cxr, wi(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, cr, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  rgen(s0, cxr, wi(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, cr, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wi(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, cr, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), w3o(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf), wceq(cv(s0), cmnf)))
  elxr(cv(s0))
  3jaoi(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf), wceq(cv(s0), cmnf), wi(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, cr, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))))
  a1d(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, cr, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))
  rspec(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))
  reltre(s0, s1)
  a1d(wceq(cv(s0), cpnf), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, cr, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))
  rspcedvd(s1, cr, nat0, wceq(cv(s0), cpnf), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)))
  0red(wceq(cv(s0), cpnf))
  adantl(wceq(cv(s0), cpnf), wceq(cv(s1), nat0), wb(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0))))
  breq1(cv(s1), nat0, clt, cv(s0))
  mpbiri(wceq(cv(s0), cpnf), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(nat0, clt, cpnf))
  0ltpnf()
  breq2(cv(s0), cpnf, nat0, clt)
  syl6bi(wceq(cv(s0), cmnf), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, cr, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cmnf, clt, cmnf))
  breq2(cv(s0), cmnf, cmnf, clt)
  ax-mp(wi(wbr(cmnf, clt, cmnf), wrex(s1, cr, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  pm2.21d(wcel(cmnf, cxr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cmnf), wrex(s1, cr, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))
  nltmnf(cmnf)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cpnf)
  diff.cpnf.s(s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, nat0, clt, cv(s0))
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm infmremnf() {
  |- wceq(cinf(cr, cxr, clt), cmnf)
} = {
  ax-mp(wceq(cinf(cr, cxr, clt), cmnf), wral(hs0, cxr, wi(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, cr, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0))))))
  reltxrnmnf(hs0, hs1)
  eqinfd(hs2, hs1, cr, cxr, clt, cmnf, wral(hs0, cxr, wi(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, cr, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0))))))
  a1i(wral(hs0, cxr, wi(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, cr, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0))))), wor(clt, cxr))
  xrltso()

  mnfxr()
  adantl(wral(hs0, cxr, wi(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, cr, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wn(wbr(cv(hs2), clt, cmnf)))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wn(wbr(cv(hs2), clt, cmnf)), wcel(cv(hs2), cxr))
  rexr(cv(hs2))
  nltmnf(cv(hs2))
  impcom(wral(hs0, cxr, wi(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, cr, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cxr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs2))), wrex(hs1, cr, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2))))
  imp(wcel(cv(hs2), cxr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs2)), wi(wral(hs0, cxr, wi(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, cr, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs1, cr, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2)))))
  com23(wcel(cv(hs2), cxr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs2)), wral(hs0, cxr, wi(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, cr, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs1, cr, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2))))
  rspcv(hs0, cv(hs2), cxr, wi(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, cr, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0)))), wi(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs2)), wrex(hs1, cr, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, cr, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0))), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs2)), wrex(hs1, cr, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2))))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), cmnf, clt)
  rexbidv(hs1, cr, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), cv(hs1), clt)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(cr)
  diff.hs2.c(cxr)
  diff.hs2.c(clt)

  diff.hs1.c(cmnf)

  ax-mp(inf(ℝ+, ℝ, <)= 0, ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, hs0[<]hs1)))
  rpltrp(hs1, hs0)
  eqinfd(hs2, hs0, crp, cr, clt, nat0, ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, hs0[<]hs1)))
  a1i(∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, hs0[<]hs1)), < ≺ ℝ)
  ltso()
  0red(∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, hs0[<]hs1)))
  adantl(∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, hs0[<]hs1)), hs2 ∈ ℝ+, ¬ hs2[<]0)
  lensymd(hs2, nat0, hs2 ∈ ℝ+)

  rpre(hs2)
  rpge0(hs2)

  sylbir((hs2 ∈ ℝ ∧ 0[<]hs2), (∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, hs0[<]hs1))→ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, hs0[<]hs2)), hs2 ∈ ℝ+)
  elrp(hs2)
  rspcv(hs1, hs2, crp, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, hs0[<]hs1), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, hs0[<]hs2))
  rexbidv(hs0, crp, hs1 = hs2, hs0[<]hs1, hs0[<]hs2)
